/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with buildings on both sides, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and brown, reflecting the urban environment.
